name: Fox-Tech Technology Co.
description: Developer of a data analytics IoT platform designed to monitor, track and improve the operation of farming, logistics, cold chain and manufacturing businesses. The company's software combines real-time data, easy-to-use applications with secure, low power, and high accuracy sensors of temperature and humidity, helping business owners mitigate crises across the value chain in over 24 countries worldwide.
one_liner: Developer of a data analytics IoT platform designed to monitor, track and improve the operation of farming, logistics, cold chain and manufacturing businesses. The company's software combines real-time data, easy-to-use applications with secure, low power, and high accuracy sensors of temperature and humidity, helping business owners mitigate crises across the value chain in over 24 countries worldwide.
